author: Wharf Rat
title: Srinagar for the New Year
text: # 1 We were all set to head to the beaches of Thailand for the New Year, but the missus and the little one insisted that they would rather see some snow this year. So, we have planned an eight-day trip to Srinagar... flight tickets are booked and we are heading to Srinagar on December 29 and returning to Kolkata on Jan 5. I have also reserved a room at Club Mahindra houseboats in Srinagar for these eight days. Its Mahindra's new-ish acquisition and there are no reviews to be found anywhere. These are my questions: - I know it will be freezing, but what are the chances of seeing snowfall in Sringar city during these days. Is a white New Year guaranteed? - Will staying in a Houseboat for eight days be uncomfortable? It's a Mahindra property, so i dont think it will be bad as far as facilities are concerned. Should I book a traditional hotel for a few days? - Any help with the itinerary will be appreciated. Thanks
